name: Don't Touch Red
description:
Dont Touch Red is a game about a Knight going on an Adventure to save his King. You control the charater with your mouse. He goes through a series of 4 worlds. Each world had 4 levels except for the Final Boss which has 1 level.  This game is made for the Middle School Video Game Design Event for a organization called TSA.

TSA Website: https://tsaweb.org

Disclaimer: This game is very hard with a touchpad. A mouse is highly recommended for best gameplay.  Fullscreen button is recommendend.

Controls: 

Move Chararacter:  Move Mouse 

Fly up (Only Flying Level):  Spacebar 

Move Sideways (Only Flying Level): Left Arrow and Right Arrow  

Shoot (Only Final Boss):  Left Click
